metadata.meta_description: EV0 is a free and open-source serverless blog template, built with Astro, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.

author.name: Ivan Sosa Tovar @istovar
author.bio: Welcome to my web portfolio! I am a passionate web developer with a focus on both front-end and back-end technologies. I am dedicated to creating efficient and appealing digital solutions that blend design and functionality..
